title: Miss Fisher's Melbourne: Before and After Visual Effects
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs

Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Description and travel
abstract: The before and after shots to make 2015 Melbourne appear as 1920s Melbourne.
description: This short work shows how digital special effects are employed to capture 'before' and 'after' shots to make 2015 Melbourne appear as 1920s Melbourne. These have been produced for 'Behind the Scenes' of the series produced by Every Cloud Productions shown on ABC television 'Miss Fisher's Murder Mysteries'.
